title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type has no effect on the displayed output.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Populate the database field with HTML text within <html>...</html> tags. 2. Populate the database field with HTML fragments not within <html> tags. 3. Populate the database field with Text containing RTF tags. 4. Use a dynamic text element to display the content of the field and observe that the content type is not reflected in the displayed output.
